professional_summary: Certified SQL Database Administrator with over 5 years of IT experience in managing and supporting Microsoft MS SQL Server 2016, 2014, 2012, and 2008 R2 in various environments. Proficient in database administration, design, monitoring, and high availability solutions.

key_responsibilities: Designing and optimizing complex databases for large-scale applications.
Implementing and managing database backup and recovery solutions to ensure data integrity.
Monitoring and troubleshooting database performance issues to maintain system availability.
Administering SQL Server databases to support organizational operations.
Optimizing database queries and performance using tools like Query Execution Plan and Database Tuning Advisor.
and log shipping for high availability.
Migrating and upgrading databases from SQL Server to MySQL and MS SQL
ensuring seamless transitions with minimal downtime.
Designing and implementing data models using tools like ERWin for new systems and enhancing existing ones.
Developing T-SQL stored procedures and functions for reporting and application integration.
